group_1.textRight: That was close... Any longer and I'd@have been in real trouble.

group_1.narration: My premonitions use up my magic,@so there's only so much I can do on my own.
I'll never be able to achieve my goals@without Kirika's help...

group_1.textCenter: I'd never hear the end of it if she knew@I went out on my own...
She'd go red shouting at me about@[chara:400100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100]how dangerous it is out there.
(She's late... How long could it take@to stir up a little trouble...?)

group_1.textLeft: I can't stop the bleeding...!@We... We have to call a doctor!

group_1.textRight: No, Oriko.@I don't need a doctor.
They wouldn't be able to help,@even if they examined me.

group_1.textLeft: What are you talking about...?!@At this rate you'llâ€”!

group_1.textRight: Oriko...@There's something I have to tell you...
Have you got all the money you dropped?

group_1.narration: I know it probably wasn't much@to you... You were just being kind,@as always...@But to me, who was always alone, you were
the light shining in the darkness of my soul.

group_1.textRight: There's more to it, of course.
Something about you just...draws me@to you. I don't know what it is...
But I kept seeking you out...@And I've tried to tell you...

group_1.narration: I always chickened out.@I thought there was no way you'd@remember someone like me...
So...I kept trying to become someone@worthy of your attention. That was my@wish when I became a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...@I've lied to you all this time, Oriko.
The me you know now isn't the real me.
The real me is a coward...
A child who can't stand up to anyone@or anything.
So thanks for going along with@my little lie anyway, Oriko.

group_1.textLeft: I... I will not stand for this!@Not one bit...
You must be punished for@your deception...!
I want you to swear to me...
...Swear to me that no matter what...@You will follow me for all time!

group_1.textCenter: (Remember, Kirika...@Remember what you swore to me...)
(Just come back to me in one piece.)
